description: Heat-resistant sole with a rubber compound that is resistant to 300°C and a glue that is resistant to 70° C. Heat activated glue WILL delaminate when exposed to fire or heat. (This delam is not covered under warranty.)
name: La Sportiva Glacier WLF - Mens

specs.value: 8mm MtnFlex with 1.5 mm Dacromet-coated half steel shank
Vibram® Ice-New HRO Test and ISO 20344 Certified
